mapper.insert:
SELECT ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE_SEQ.nextVal as announcementCode from dual
insert into Recruitment values ( (SELECT COR_CODE FROM CORPORATION_INFO WHERE COR_NAME = #{corName}), #{announcementCode}, #{announcement}, (SELECT RECRUIT_FIELD_CODE FROM RecruitFieldCode WHERE RECRUIT_FIELD = #{recruitField}), #{salary}, #{careerCode}, #{recruitPerson}, #{receiptStartDate}, #{receiptEndDate}, #{receiptStartDate}, '01' )

SELECT COR_CODE_SEQ.nextVal as corCode from dual
insert into CORPORATION_INFO values (#{corCode}, #{userName})

INSERT INTO USER_INFO(USER_CODE, COR_CODE, USER_EMAIL, USER_PASSWORD, USER_TYPE, USER_JOINDATE) VALUES (USER_CODE_SEQ.nextval, (SELECT COR_CODE FROM CORPORATION_INFO WHERE COR_NAME = #{userName}), CONCAT(CONCAT('cor',#{corCode}),'@gmail.com'), CONCAT('cor',#{corCode}), '2', SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT cor.COR_CODE corCode, cor.COR_NAME corName, re.Announcement_Code announcementCode, re.Announcement announcement, re.salary salary, re.RECEIPT_START receiptStartDate from CORPORATION_INFO cor, Recruitment re where cor.COR_CODE = re.COR_CODE ORDER BY re.RECEIPT_START

select re.ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE, cor.cor_code, cor.cor_name, re.announcement, re.RECRUIT_FIELD_Code, ref.RECRUIT_FIELD, re.salary, re.Career_Code, c.career career, re.RECRUIT_PERSON, re.receipt_start, re.receipt_end, re.RECRUIT_WRITEDATE FROM CORPORATION_INFO cor, Recruitment re, RecruitFieldCode ref, CareerCode c where re.Announcement_Code = #{listAnnCode} and re.cor_code = cor.cor_code and re.RECRUIT_FIELD_Code = ref.RECRUIT_FIELD_CODE and re.Career_Code = c.Career_Code
select NVL(et.employtype, '') from multiEmp me, EmployTypeCode et where ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE = #{listAnnCode} and me.EMPLOYTYPE_CODE = et.EMPLOYTYPE_CODE
select wa.WORKING_AREA from multiWorkArea mw, WorkingAreaCode wa where ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE = #{listAnnCode} and mw.WORKING_AREA_CODE = wa.WORKING_AREA_CODE
select arc.ACADEMIC_RECORD from multiAcaReco mar, AcademicRecordCode arc where ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE = #{listAnnCode} and mar.ACADEMIC_RECORD_CODE = arc.ACADEMIC_RECORD_CODE
select NVL(et.employtype_code, '') from multiEmp me, EmployTypeCode et where me.ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE = #{listAnnCode} and me.EMPLOYTYPE_CODE = et.EMPLOYTYPE_CODE
select wa.WORKING_AREA_code from multiWorkArea mw, WorkingAreaCode wa where mw.ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE = #{listAnnCode} and mw.WORKING_AREA_CODE = wa.WORKING_AREA_CODE
select arc.ACADEMIC_RECORD_code from multiAcaReco mar, AcademicRecordCode arc where mar.ANNOUNCEMENT_CODE = #{listAnnCode} and mar.ACADEMIC_RECORD_CODE = arc.ACADEMIC_RECORD_CODE

select * from( select rownum as rnum, re.* from ( select cor.cor_name corName, r.announcement announcement, r.announcement_code announcementCode, r.salary salary, r.RECEIPT_END receiptEndDate from recruitment r, corporation_info cor where cor.cor_code = r.cor_code order by announcement_code desc ) re where rownum <= #{startIndex}+#{pageSize} ) where rnum >= #{startIndex}+1
